name: Neko Dungeon 喵酱迷城 喵醬迷城 ねこダンジョン
description: This is a game similar to Roguelike, which focuses on strategy. There are lots of random maze and divergent story modes in the game.We need to help the lovely heroine escape from a dungeon, and at the same time, compete with your friends for a better score . Are you ready?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64BIT) Processor: 1.6 GHz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA OR AMD DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound +
